name: I don't think impatient people can be good teachers.
trans: 我不觉得没有耐心的人可以成为好老师。

name: Teachers don't just impart knowledge;it's more important that they teach students how to think and gain knowledge by themselves.
trans: 教师不仅传授知识，更重要的是教会学生如何独立思考和自己获取知识。

name: Good teachers should be good listeners.They should take time to listen to how kids feel about certain things.
trans: 好老师应该是好听众。他们应该花时间去倾听孩子们对某些事情的感受。

name: Students look up to their teachers and see them as role models.
trans: 学生们尊敬老师，视他们为榜样。

name: Although the government has been working to change it,many American teachers are still underpaid.
trans: 虽然美国政府一直在努力改变这一情况，但很多美国教师的工资依然很低。

name: My favourite piece of furniture is a leather chair that sits in my living room.
trans: 我最喜欢的一件家具是客厅里的一把皮椅。

name: I placed it in a perfect position for sunshine and ventilation.
trans: 我把它放在了一个光线和通风都极好的位置。

name: I enjoy sitting in this chair and doing some reading when I have time on my hands.
trans: 当我有时间的时候，我喜欢坐在这把椅子上看看书。

name: What I like is a folding chair.I dig it because I can easily put it away and out of sight when I'm not using it.
trans: 我喜欢的是一把折叠椅。我喜欢它因为当我不用它的时候，我可以很容易地 把它收起来放在一边。

name: My wardrobe is big and has five drawers.I have all my dresses and skirts organized in the top two drawers.
trans: 我的衣柜很大，有五个抽屉。我把我所有的连衣裙和短裙都放在了最上面的两个抽屉里。

name: This is a good-looking wardrobe and it's in keeping with all my other furniture,which makes me like it even more.
trans: 这是一个漂亮的衣柜，它与我其他的家具风格协调一致，这让我更喜欢它了。

name: The piece of furniture I use the most in my apartment is my writing desk, which has been in my family's possession for decades.
trans: 我家里使用最多的家具是我的写字台，它在我家已经有几十年了。

name: Although it doesn't look very valuable,the desk is actually a family heirloom.My dad inherited it from his dad,my grandfather.
trans: 虽然它看起来不是很贵重，但这张桌子实际上是一个传家宝。我父亲从他父亲、也就是我的祖父那里继承了它。

name: I like my coffee table because it's where I place my coffee.I love having a cup of Joe there every morning.
trans: 我喜欢我的茶几，因为那是我放咖啡的地方。我喜欢每天早上在那里喝一杯咖啡。

name: My dad is just like Sheldon,the main character on the hit show The Big Bang Theory.He has his own spot on our couch.
trans: 我爸爸和热门剧《生活大爆炸》的主角谢尔顿一样，他在我们家的沙发上有他自己的位置。

name: I'd like to talk about my smartphone,which is a Samsung phone.It's slim and black in colour and looks indeed very smart.
trans: 我想谈谈我的智能手机，它是一部三星手机。它很轻薄，机身是黑色的，看起来确实很时髦。

name: This phone features the best camera in the smartphone industry.I love it that I can take stunning photos with it.
trans: 这款手机的相机在行业中是最好的。它能拍出很棒的照片，我很喜欢这一点。

name: I can use my phone to stay in touch with my friends and family through text messages and calls.
trans: 我可以用手机通过短信和电话和我的朋友和家人保持联系。

name: It allows me to access the internet,so I can constantly be updated on what's happening around the world.
trans: 我能用它上网，所以我可以不断地了解到世界上的最新消息。

name: I can do anything on this phone,so it's an integral part of my life now.
trans: 我可以在这部手机上做任何事情，所以它成了我生活中不可或缺的一部分。

name: My favourite electronic device is my laptop.I'm not exaggerating by saying that I can't live without it.
trans: 我最喜欢的电子设备是我的笔记本电脑。我毫不夸张地说，我的生活不能没有它。

name: I like to use it to watch some stand-up comedy every night before hitting the sack.
trans: 我喜欢每天晚上睡觉前在电脑上看一些单口喜剧。

name: I'm a voracious reader and  I consider my Kindle to be one of the most important things to me.
trans: 我是一个极度喜欢读书的人，我把我的Kindle当作我最重要的东西之一。

name: It looks good and is very portable.I can even slip it into one of my jacket pockets.
trans: 它看起来很不错，而且很便携。我甚至可以把它塞进我的夹克口袋里。

name: This device allows me to take notes while reading,so there's always something I can refer back to after I've read a chapter or a few pages.
trans: 这个设备可以让我在阅读的时候做笔记，所以在我读了一章或几页之后，我总是有些东西可以回看、参考。

name: I can have access to a large number of books and other reading materials wherever I am.
trans: 不管我在哪里，我都能获得大量的图书和其他阅读材料。

name: In my opinion,men tend to be more obsessed with gadgets than women.
trans: 在我看来，男人往往比女人更迷恋电子产品。

name: They always want to get hold of the latest model of a smartphone and try out its new functions.
trans: 他们总是想得到最新型号的智能手机，尝试新的功能。

name: Women generally see an electronic item as something practical,whereas men regard it as a plaything.
trans: 女人通常把电子产品视为实用的工具，而男人则视之为可供消遣的玩物。

name: Advances in mobile technology have transformed how we access news and gain knowledge.
trans: 移动技术的发展彻底改变了我们获取新闻和知识的方式。

name: A large proportion of young people today spend most of their free time on social media.
trans: 如今，很大比例的年轻人把大部分的空闲时间花在社交媒体上。

name: They're constantly checking to see if their posts have been liked or shared.
trans: 他们总是去查看自己的帖子是否被点赞或分享。

name: It's okay if we spend some time in the virtual world every day,but we should avoid being lost in it.
trans: 如果我们每天只是在虚拟世界中花费一些时间，那是可以的，但是我们应该避免迷失其中。

name: Artificial intelligence is developing at a rapid speed.
trans: 人工智能正在飞速发展。

name: Some people are rather pessimistic about the future of an electronic world,claiming that humans will be ruled by devices.
trans: 有些人对电子世界的未来相当悲观，声称人类将被电子设备所统治。

name: One of the games I used to play as a child was chess.I loved that fact that I could always outwit other kids at this game.
trans: 我小时候经常玩的一个游戏是象棋。我特别喜欢在下棋时总能智胜其他孩 子的感觉。

name: I remember being on top of the world when my dad told me that he had bought me a chess set as a birthday gift.
trans: 我记得当爸爸告诉我他给我买了一副国际象棋作为生日礼物时，我非常开心。

name: One of the most important things I learned from playing chess is to be patient.
trans: 我从下棋中学到的最重要的事情之一就是要有耐心。

name: “Truth or Dare”has been my favourite game since high school.
trans: “真心话大冒险”是我高中以来最喜欢的游戏。

name: I like to dare my friends to go out into the street and sing opera.
trans: 我喜欢让我的朋友们去街上唱歌剧。(大冒险的项目)

name: One secret I revealed was that I was having a crush on a girl who was sitting right next to me during the game.
trans: 我透露过的一个秘密是，我特别喜欢当时玩游戏时坐在我旁边的那个女孩。

name: Once,I snuck out of school to an internet bar to play my favourite game,Counter-Strike,during an English class.
trans: 有一次，我在英语课上偷偷溜出学校去网吧玩我最喜欢的游戏——《反恐精英》。

name: Our English teacher failed me in the final exam after finding out where I had been.
trans: 我们的英语老师在发现我去了哪里后，在期末考试给了我不及格的成绩。

name: My cousin is so addicted to gaming and he can play for 10 hours straight.
trans: 我的表弟很沉迷于玩游戏，他可以连续玩上10个小时。

name: I think games play an essential role in our lives.
trans: 我认为游戏在我们的生活中扮演着重要的角色。

name: Playing games is beneficial to children's imagination,creativity and brain development.
trans: 玩游戏对孩子的想象力、创造力和大脑发育都有好处。

name: They help us unwind,bond with our friends and even enhance our operation skills.
trans: 它们帮助我们放松，促进与朋友的感情，甚至提高我们的合作技能。

name: Games teach children how to accept failures.
trans: 游戏教会孩子如何接受失败。

name: I've always believed in“All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy.
trans: 我一直相信“只会用功不玩耍，聪明的孩子也变傻”。

name: It's quite interesting that many high-achievers at school also play some games well
trans: 很有趣的是，许多成绩优异的学生玩有些游戏也玩得很好。

name: Using time effectively is absolutely very important and I think one way to do it is to make a to-do list.
trans: 有效利用时间是非常重要的，我认为达成这个目的的一种方法是列一个任务清单。

name: Planning is the key to managing your time well.Once you've made a plan, stick to it.
trans: 计划是管理好时间的关键。 一旦你制定了计划，就要坚持下去。

name: Prioritizing tasks is equally important.The most urgent things should be done first.
trans: 优先处理任务同样重要。最紧急的事情应该先做。

name: Some people tend to procrastinate and leave things until the last minute.
trans: 有些人总是喜欢拖延，把事情拖到最后一刻才做。

name: I used to put off working on every one of my essays,which resulted in getting poor grades in college.
trans: 我在上大学时，写每一篇论文都会拖延，这导致我成绩很差。

name: I'm terrible at time management.I always start doing my homework when it's due the next day.
trans: 我的时间管理很糟糕。我总是在第二天要交作业的时候才开始做作业。

name: I'm not good at organizing time.I've always found that deadlines are very hard to meet.
trans: 我不善于分配时间，总是难以在截止日期前完成工作。

name: I tend to waste a lot of time every day checking social media and going through old text messages with my friends.
trans: 我每天都会浪费很多时间在刷社交软件，以及翻看之前和朋友发的短信上。

name: I get anxious when I know that I'm behind schedule,and weirdly enough,that sense of anxiety makes me more productive.
trans: 当我知道我的工作进度落后了，我会感到焦虑。奇怪的是，这种焦虑感让我变得更有效率。

name: I admire those of my coworkers who are always ahead of schedule no matter what project they're working on.
trans: 我钦佩我的一些同事，不管在做什么项目，他们总是可以比预期计划完成得快。

name: It's necessary that we take a break once in a while to recharge so that we can go back to work more energetic and productive.
trans: 我们有必要时不时休息一下，充个电，这样我们回去工作才会精力充沛、更有效率。

name: Some people take time management classes to learn how to use their time more wisely.
trans: 有些人上时间管理课程来学习如何更合理地利用时间。

name: Time management is a lifelong job and the sooner we learn this skill,the more benefits we will get.
trans: 时间管理是一项终身的工作，我们越早学会这个技能，受益就越多。

name: The reason why it's hard to stick to our plans is that we're often distracted by unimportant things that happen around us.
trans: 很难坚持我们的计划的原因是，我们经常为身边发生的不重要的事情而分心。

name: What's crucial in teaching children how to organize their time in an effective way is parents setting good examples themselves.
trans: 要教导孩子如何有效地安排时间，关键是家长们自己树立好榜样。

name: I'm taking the IELTS test so that I can go and study in the UK in order to improve my English and expand my horizons.
trans: 我参加雅思考试是为了去英国学习，以提高我的英语水平，以及开阔我的视野。

name: We begin to learn English at a very young age in China,but all those years of learning don't seem to pay off.
trans: 中国学生从很小的时候就开始学习英语，但是那么多年的学习似乎收效甚微。

name: The reason why I fell in love with learning English is that I got hooked on English songs.
trans: 我爱上学习英语的原因是我迷上了英文歌。

name: Watching English movies and TV shows is a great way to learn words and sentence structures used in everyday conversation.
trans: 看英语电影和电视节目是学习日常对话中使用的词汇和句型结构的好方法。

name: Taylor has taught me a large number of idioms and slang words.
trans: 泰勒教了我大量的习语和俚语。

name: It's best to have someone from an English-speaking country to talk with on a regular basis.
trans: 最好可以定期与英语母语者进行沟通练习。

name: There's a cafe in my city which many foreigners like to frequent.I go there from time to time to interact with them to practise my English.
trans: 在我的城市里有一家许多外国人喜欢光顾的咖啡馆。我偶尔会去那里和他们互动交流，练习我的英语。

name: English has no standard form.There are many different accents,which can vary greatly.
trans: 英语没有标准形式。有许多不同的口音，差别很大。

name: English is a mandatory subject at school in many countries.
trans: 英语在许多国家的学校里都是一门必修课。

name: Our English learning mainly focuses on analyzing grammar and memorizing vocabulary rather than speaking and listening.
trans: 我们的英语学习主要关注分析语法和记忆单词，而不是说和听。

name: With globalization taking place at such a fast speed,English has become more and more important for international communication.
trans: 随着全球化的飞速发展，英语对于国际交流来说变得越来越重要。

name: It's essential for people from all over the world to have a lingua franca to communicate with each other.
trans: 对于来自世界各地的人们来说，有一种通用语言来互相交流是很重要的。

name: An increasing number of Chinese students are studying abroad,and being able to speak English well is a must for them.
trans: 越来越多的中国学生到国外留学，能说一口流利的英语对他们来说是必须的。

name: Misunderstandings may occur when people can't converse with each other properly.
trans: 当人们不能准确地在交谈中表达想法时，可能会产生误解。

name: Every time I travel somewhere,I try to learn a bit of the local language.
trans: 每次我去某个地方旅行，我都努力去学习一些当地的语言。

name: It allows me to integrate with the locals better,and therefore have a more enjoyable trip.
trans: 它使我能更好地融入当地人，从而享受一次更愉快的旅行。

name: Trying to grasp another language helps people gain a better understanding of another culture.
trans: 努力去掌握另一种语言有助于人们更好地理解另一种文化。

name: More and more people are bilingual and even multilingual now.
trans: 现在越来越多的人会说两种语言，甚至多种语言。

name: If someone can only speak their mother tongue,they will find it hard to survive in today's world.
trans: 如果有人只会说他们自己的母语，他们会发现在当今世界生存非常困难。

name: Being able to speak more than one language gives people a competitive edge in the job market.
trans: 在就业市场上，能说不止一种语言会给人们带来竞争优势。

name: Research has shown that language learning helps develop a child's brain.
trans: 研究表明，语言学习有助于开发孩子的大脑。

name: Children can think more logically and creatively if they start learning a foreign language at a young age.
trans: 如果孩子们在很小的时候就开始学习外语，他们的思维就会更有逻辑性和创造性。

name: It's said that language learning helps old people prevent dementia.
trans: 据说语言学习可以帮助老年人预防痴呆。

name: Mandarin is spoken by an increasing number of people around the world.
trans: 世界上越来越多的人使用中文普通话。

name: With China becoming more and more influential,our language will play an increasingly bigger role on the world stage.
trans: 随着中国越来越有影响力，我们的语言将在世界舞台上发挥越来越大的作用。

name: Chinese has many different dialects spoken in various parts of the country.
trans: 中文在全国各地有许多不同的方言。

name: Some people are worried that minority languages might disappear with English spoken in more and more countries and regions.
trans: 一些人担心，随着越来越多的国家和地区使用英语，小语种可能会消失。

name: It's argued by some that there's no need to have more than one language.
trans: 有些人认为我们没有必要拥有一种以上的语言。

name: There's a risk that the cultures,traditions and lifestyles associated with those languages could die out with them.
trans: 与这些语言相关的文化、传统和生活方式可能会有消亡的危险。

name: It's crucial that small languages are preserved in order to retain cultural diversity.
trans: 为了保持文化的多样性，保留小语种是至关重要的。

name: There are all kinds of advertisements today—TV commercials,billboards, posters,flyers and so forth.
trans: 如今有各种各样的广告——电视广告、广告牌、海报、传单等。

name: My boyfriend has just opened a new cafe.He asks me to print some flyers and hand them out on the streets to spread the word.
trans: 我男朋友刚开了一家新的咖啡馆。他让我打印一些传单，然后到街上去发， 来传播这个消息。

name: Advertising is crucial in making a company stand out in today's competitive world.
trans: 在当今竞争激烈的世界，广告是使一家公司脱颖而出的关键。

name: Increasing brand awareness is vital for any company who wants to survive in today's market.
trans: 对于任何想在今天的市场上生存下来的公司来说，提高品牌知名度是至关重要的。

name: Some celebrities endorse products and services that they've never used.
trans: 一些名人代言他们从未使用过的产品和服务。

name: These celebrity endorsements have a huge impact on those groupies who love their idols blindly.
trans: 这些明星代言会对那些盲目的追星族产生巨大的影响。

name: Most TV commercials are very annoying,and I try not to be influenced by them.I trust word of mouth more.
trans: 大多数电视广告都很烦人，我尽量不受它们的影响。我更相信口碑。

name: It gets on my nerves when a commercial suddenly appears when I'm watching a fascinating TV show.
trans: 当我在看一个精彩的电视节目时，要是突然出现广告，会让我很烦。

name: Some ads on TV are okay if they're creative,hilarious or touching.
trans: 一些电视上的广告如果有创意、搞笑或感人，也是可以接受的。

name: I adore those commercials that feature catchy jingles.Some of them get stuck in my head and I just never forget the ads.
trans: 我喜欢那些有朗朗上口的歌曲的广告。其中有一些深深印在我的脑中，我永远都不会忘记这些广告。

name: Just do it”is one of those successful slogans that are so simple and unique, and therefore hard to forget.
trans: “Just do it”是那些成功的广告语之一，简单又独特，因此很难忘记。

name: Well-written copy is essential in helping an ad spread.
trans: 好的文案对于帮助广告传播很重要。

name: The kind of advertising I hate the most is cold calls.It's a terrible feeling to know that my information has been somehow leaked.
trans: 我最讨厌的广告方式是电话推销。知道我的信息被无端泄露让我很不开心。

name: Not many companies use door-to-door sales anymore.
trans: 现在没有多少公司上门推销产品了。

name: I  think  there  should  be  more  public  service  advertisements  on  TV  to raise  awareness  of  some  social  issues,like  air  pollution,deforestation, endangered animal species and so on.
trans: 我认为电视上应该有更多的公益广告来提高人们对一些社会问题的认识，比如空气污染、森林砍伐、濒危动物等。

name: Online advertising has been gaining great popularity these years.We see banner ads on almost any website
trans: 近年来，网络广告越来越受欢迎。在几乎任何网站上，我们都能看到横幅广告。

name: In my opinion,social media marketing is the best way to attract potential customers.
trans: 在我看来，社交媒体营销是吸引潜在客户的最好方式。

name: Some companies have built large fan bases on social media,and this undoubtedly will lead to better profits.
trans: 一些公司在社交媒体上建立了庞大的粉丝群，这无疑会带来更好的利润。

name: Some ads go viral on social networks,so people talk about them all the time.
trans: 有些广告在社交网络上迅速传播，所以人们总是谈论它们。

name: I remember reading the classified ads section of a newspaper every day when I was a kid.I only did it for fun.
trans: 我记得小时候，每天都读报纸的分类广告栏。我只是为了好玩。

name: It's important for a company to place an ad somewhere after they've launched a new product.
trans: 在公司推出新产品后，投放广告是很重要的。

name: It helps to inform people about the existence of a certain product or service so that they're more likely to go and purchase it.
trans: 这有助于让人们了解到某一产品或服务的存在，这样的话，他们更有可能去购买它。

name: It's funny that there are countless ads everywhere and we hardly pay any attention to them
trans: 有趣的是，到处都有数不清的广告，而我们几乎不会注意到它们。

name: What I like to do before making a purchase is read through all the reviews of that particular item and make my decision based on them.
trans: 在购买一件商品之前，我喜欢做的事情是阅读所有关于它的评论，并根据它们做出我的决定。

name: Positive testimonials of a product are the best way to advertise.
trans: 一件产品的好评是最好的宣传方式。

name: Although some people claim that they're never influenced by advertisements, I doubt it's really the case.
trans: 虽然有些人声称他们从来不会受到广告的影响，但我怀疑事实是否如此。

name: When people watch,see or hear a particular ad,it plants a seed in their heads and begins to affect their purchasing decisions subconsciously.
trans: 当人们看到或听到某个特定的广告时，就会在脑海中播下一颗种子，并开始在潜意识层面影响他们的购买决定。

name: One of the most memorable advertisements I’ve seen was one about elephants.
trans: 我看过的最令人难忘的广告之一是一则关于大象的广告。

name: It was a public service ad which calls for people to stop buying ivory products.
trans: 它是一则公益广告，呼吁人们停止购买象牙制品。

name: It left a deep impression on me because the images used were so graphic and powerful.
trans: 它给我留下了深刻的印象，因为广告中所使用的图像是如此生动有力。

name: There was a time when photos were only taken by cameras.It's changed significantly now.
trans: 曾经只有相机才能拍照。现在有了很大的改变(手机等都可以拍照)。

name: Everyone is a photographer in this day and age.Their smartphones enable them to take high-quality photos wherever they are.
trans: 当今时代，每个人都是摄影师。他们的智能手机让他们无论身在何处都能拍出高质量的照片。

name: This shift from the camera to the smartphone has altered the way we record our lives.
trans: 这种从照相机到智能手机的转变，改变了我们记录生活的方式。

name: One of my favourite gifts over the years has been an DSLR camera that my dad gave me when I turned 20.
trans: 这些年来我最喜欢的礼物之一，就是我20岁时爸爸送给我的单反相机。

name: This camera is an item that I treasure so much because it allows me to have a record of everything I see and everywhere I go.
trans: 这部相机是我非常珍爱的物品，因为它让我能记录下我看到的每一件东西、所到的每一个地方。

name: My dad is an amateur photographer and his passion is to snap photos of ancient buildings.
trans: 我爸爸是一个业余摄影师，他的爱好是拍古建筑的照片。

name: We went to a 500-year-old temple in Shanxi last month and he managed to capture dozens of amazing pictures.
trans: 上个月，我们去了山西一个有500年历史的寺庙，他拍摄了许多令人赞叹的照片。

name: Not only do I take photos,but I also like to print them out and make photo albums with them.
trans: 我不仅拍照片，我还喜欢冲洗照片，将它们制作成相簿。

name: It gives me a great feeling when I flick through an album and reminisce about the past.
trans: 当我翻阅一本相册并回忆过去时，感觉很棒。

name: I think most people are nostalgic,and so the vast majority of people adore taking pictures and looking at them.
trans: 我觉得大部分人都很怀旧，所以绝大多数的人都喜欢拍照片和看照片。

name: I remember one time when I was looking at some old photos of my grandma,all those fond memories came flooding back.
trans: 我记得有一次，当我看到我奶奶的一些旧照片时，所有那些美好的回忆都涌上心头。

name: We only live one certain moment once,so by looking at photos,we sort of relive some experiences.
trans: 有些特定的时刻我们只能经历一次，所以通过看照片，我们可以重温一些经历。

name: I don't consider myself photogenic,so I don't like to be taken pictures of.
trans: 我不认为自己很上相，所以我不喜欢被拍照。

name: Sometimes,my girlfriend retouches some of the pictures she's taken.
trans: 有时候，我女朋友会修她拍的一些照片。

name: The retouched photos can be so different from the original ones.
trans: 修过的照片和原来的照片很不一样。

name: I used to write letters a lot when I was a child as I had a pen pal back then.
trans: 我在小的时候经常写信，因为那时我有一个笔友。

name: Sometimes,I would pester my mom for a couple of hours to buy some envelopes and stamps for me.
trans: 有时候，我会缠着我妈妈几个小时，让她给我买一些信封和邮票。

name: Running to the post office to mail my letters to her was one of the happiest things I did as a child.
trans: 跑到邮局寄信给她是我小时候最快乐的事情之一。

name: I remember writing a letter to a girl that I had a crush on when I was in middle school.
trans: 我记得在我上中学的时候，给一个我特别喜欢的女孩写了一封信。

name: In that letter,I told her that I had liked her for a long time and I hoped that she would be my girlfriend.
trans: 在那封信里，我告诉她我喜欢她很久了，我希望她能成为我的女朋友。

name: She rejected me.
trans: 她拒绝了我。

name: One of the most important letters I've ever gotten was the admission letter from my university.
trans: 我收到的最重要的一封信是我大学的录取通知书。

name: The moment I opened the envelope and saw that I had been admitted, I was on top of the world.
trans: 就在我打开信封，看到我被录取的那一刻，我开心极了。

name: I don't write letters now because most of the time I make calls or send emails.
trans: 我现在不写信了，因为大多数时候我打电话或发邮件。

name: Writing and sending letters is extremely time-consuming compared to writing emails.
trans: 和写电子邮件相比，写信和寄信非常耗时。

name: With the growth of instant messaging,letters are quickly losing their place.
trans: 随着即时通信的发展，信件正在快速被取代。

name: If it's a thank-you letter,people are more likely to write it by hand.
trans: 如果是写感谢信，人们更倾向于手写。

name: One thing we can learn from letters that are hundreds of years old is the kind of lives people used to live.
trans: 我们可以从几百年前的信件中学到的一样东西是人们过去的生活方式。

name: We can get a better understanding of the kind of language used in the past because language evolves over time.
trans: 我们可以更好地理解过去使用的语言，因为语言是随着时间而发展的。

name: Handwritten letters may be completely replaced in the foreseeable future.
trans: 在可预见的将来，手写信件可能会被完全取代。

name: George is my all-time favourite actor.He's a terrific actor with a natural gift of depicting the characters.
trans: 乔治是我一直以来最喜欢的演员。他是一个出色的演员，天生具有刻画人物的天赋。

name: Jennifer is an award-winning actress and well-known all over the world.
trans: 詹妮弗是一位屡获殊荣的女演员，在世界各地都很有名。

name: Tom is so versatile that he's starred in so many different types of movies.
trans: 汤姆非常多才多艺，他主演过许多不同类型的电影。

name: This is a movie with a star-studded cast.Leonardo played a cameo role in  it.
trans: 这是一部明星云集的电影。莱昂纳多在其中扮演了一个小配角。

name: Fast and Furious is my favourite movie franchise.
trans: 《速度与激情》是我最喜欢的系列电影。

name: I can't wait for the prequel to come out.
trans: 我已经等不及看到它的前传上映了。

name: I liked the first The Man from Macao movie,but the sequel was a disaster.
trans: 我喜欢第一部《澳门风云》电影，但是它的续集简直烂透了。

name: People love this song because it's catchy,but more importantly,because it's uplifting.
trans: 人们喜欢这首歌，因为它朗朗上口，但更重要的是，因为它能振奋人心。

name: The song tells a story about people who are trying to fulfill their dreams and realizing their dreams in the end.
trans: 这首歌讲述了人们努力实现自己的梦想并最终梦想成真的故事。

name: I used to put it on repeat and listen to it over and over again when I was down and depressed.
trans: 过去当我情绪低落的时候，我常常把这首歌重复播放， 一遍又一遍地听。

name: The lyrics of the song truly make it stand out.They're so well-written and I really like how the lines rhyme.
trans: 这首歌的歌词使整首歌尤为出色。歌词写得很好，我也很喜欢里面的押韵。

name: It reminds me of the good old days.Every time I listen to this song,memories come flooding back to me.
trans: 这让我想起了过去的美好时光。每当我听到这首歌，回忆就会涌上心头。

name: One of my favourite songs is a lullaby that my mom used to sing to me when she was tucking me in.
trans: 我最喜欢的一首歌曲，是我小时候妈妈在我睡前给我唱的摇篮曲。

name: I've been fond of it since I was a kid because it's associated with the quality time that I used to spend with my mom
trans: 我从小就喜欢它，因为它总让我想起我和妈妈共度的美好时光。

name: The guitar is a popular instrument and those who play it are seen as cool and charming
trans: 吉他是一种受欢迎的乐器，大家都觉得会弹吉他的人很酷、很有魅力。

name: Watching a saxophone performance when I was   sparked my interest in this instrument.
trans: 岁时观看了一场萨克斯演奏，激发了我对这件乐器的兴趣。

name: Many girls in China are asked to learn the piano from a very young age because it's expected to make them look graceful and elegant.
trans: 在中国，很多女孩从小就被要求学习钢琴，因为这将使她们看起来优雅得体。

name: My violin was kind of like a toy for me.It was what I spent the most time on as a kid.It was my best friend.
trans: 我的小提琴有点像我的玩具。我小时候在小提琴上花费了最多的时间。它曾是我 最好的朋友。

name: What I love the most about the violin is the soothing sound it produces.It calms me down when I feel anxious or agitated.
trans: 我最喜欢小提琴那舒缓的声音。当我感到焦虑不安时，它会使我平静下来。

name: Traditional instruments are part of a country's heritage and identity.
trans: 传统乐器是国家文化遗产和身份认同的一部分。

name: Learning to play traditional instruments allows children to get a better understanding of their country's history and culture.
trans: 学习演奏传统乐器可以让孩子更好地了解自己国家的历史和文化。

name: The painting I saw last weekend evoked a memory of my childhood,and I suppose that's why it left a deep impression on me.
trans: 我上周末看到的这幅画唤起了我对童年的回忆，我想这就是为什么它给我留下了深刻印象。

name: A good painting is absolutely one that you can't take your eyes off.
trans: 一幅好画会让你目不转睛，看个不停。

name: I don't suppose what sets a painting apart is the skill involved in painting it; instead,it should be the message it sends.
trans: 我不认为使一幅画脱颖而出的是绘画时所用的技巧，而是它所传达的信息。

name: Art is a crucial subject at school because it brings out the creative side of us.
trans: 美术是一个重要的学科，因为它可以激发我们有创造性的一面。

name: Mona Lisa,painted by Leonardo da Vinci,is the most recognized and most visited artwork in the history of art.
trans: 莱昂纳多·达·芬奇画的《蒙娜丽莎》,是艺术史上最受认可、最热门的艺术作品。

name: What fascinates me the most is her charming smile.It's beautiful,and at the same time,has lots of mysteries.
trans: 最让我着迷的是她那迷人的微笑。它很美，同时也蕴藏着很多秘密。

name: Many stage plays these days are adapted from best-selling novels in order to appeal to more young people.
trans: 为了吸引更多的年轻人，现今许多舞台剧都改编自畅销小说。

name: They might be adapted into movies as well.
trans: 它们也可能被改编成电影。

name: Their acting was impeccable.I was moved to tears several times during the play.
trans: 他们的表演简直无可挑剔。在观剧期间，我好几次被感动到流泪。

name: Traffic is horrendous in my hometown during the rush hour.
trans: 在高峰期的时候，我家乡的交通特别差。

name: I hate to be caught up in traffic for a long time,so I usually leave home early in the morning to avoid rush hour traffic.
trans: 我讨厌被长时间堵在路上，所以我通常早上很早出门，以避开交通高峰时段。

name: I sat in a traffic jam for two hours last weekend.To make matters worse,I had a flat tire later that day.
trans: 上周末我在路上堵了两个小时。更糟的是，那天晚些时候我的轮胎还爆了。

name: Our local government should invest in more parking spots because it's extremely hard to park in the city centre.
trans: 我们的当地政府应该投资建造更多的停车位，因为在市中心停车太困难了。

name: There should be more bicycle lanes in the city so that more people can opt for this eco-friendly form of transportation.
trans: 城市里应该有更多的自行车道，这样的话，更多的人就可以选择这种环保的交通方式了。

name: Although it's already a lot better than before,jaywalking is still pretty common.
trans: 虽然情况已经比以前好多了，但乱穿马路的行为还是很普遍的。

name: It's common to see volunteers at intersections urging people not to run red lights.
trans: 在十字路口看到志愿者督促人们不要闯红灯，是很常见的。

name: Many people don't have the habit of buckling up when they get in the car.
trans: 很多人都没有在上车时系安全带的习惯。

name: It was my dad who was responsible for picking me up from school when I was a child.
trans: 在我小时候，是我爸爸负责接我放学。

name: We each drank a big cup of coffee and set off around five.
trans: 我们每人都喝了一大杯咖啡，大约五点就出发了。

name: We pulled over at least five times to take photos of the beautiful scenery along the way
trans: 我们至少靠边停车了五次，为了拍摄沿途的美景。

name: It was really annoying when others kept cutting us off.
trans: 别的车总是“加塞儿”插到我们前边，真的很烦人。

name: My friends kept telling me to speed up.I never listened to them because I was being careful.
trans: 我的朋友不断告诉我要加快速度。我一直没有听他们的话，因为我在小心驾驶。

name: At one point,we realized that we were going in the wrong direction.I had to make a U-turn and go back where we came.
trans: 在某一时刻，我们意识到我们走错了方向。我不得不掉头回到我们来的地方。

name: Public transportation is extremely convenient in my hometown,with bus stations and subway stations in all corners of the city.
trans: 在我的家乡，公共交通非常方便，在城市的各个角落都有公交车站和地铁站。

name: The local government is working to add two more subway lines to the city.
trans: 地方政府正在努力在城市里增加两条地铁线路。

name: I take the express bus to work every day,which only takes me about 30 minutes to arrive.
trans: 我每天坐特快公交去上班，只需要30分钟就到了。

name: We don't need cash when we take public transportation.We just swipe a card when getting on and off the bus.
trans: 我们乘坐公共交通工具时不需要现金。我们只是在上车和下车时刷个卡。

name: They say a short commute to work is an important contributor to happiness.
trans: 大家都说通勤时间短是幸福的重要因素。

name: Where I work is quite far from my home,and I have to transfer three times on the subway to get there.
trans: 我工作的地方离我家很远，我必须换乘三次地铁才能到达那里。

name: Since we have a huge population,buses tend to be overcrowded all the time.
trans: 由于人口众多，公交车总是人满为患。

name: The bus I took yesterday was jam-packed.I couldn't even reach my phone in my pocket.
trans: 我昨天乘坐的公共汽车挤满了人，我甚至连口袋里的手机都拿不到。

name: My boyfriend asked me whether we should buy a one-way ticket or a round- trip ticket.
trans: 我男朋友问我要买单程票还是往返票。

name: My dad had never taken a plane before,so he was pretty nervous while going through security check,which made him look really suspicious.
trans: 我爸爸以前从来没有坐过飞机，所以他在过安检时非常紧张，这让他看起来很可疑。

name: There was a delay and our plane ended up arriving an hour late.
trans: 飞机延误了，我们的飞机最终晚到了一个小时。

name: Flight attendants told us to wait half an hour after we had boarded the plane.
trans: 在我们登机后，空乘人员告诉我们要等半小时。

name: I told my uncle my ETA so that he would know when to come to the airport to pick me up.
trans: 我告诉了我叔叔我的预计到达时间，这样他就知道什么时候来机场接我了。

name: I got stalled at the baggage claim because it took forever for my suitcase to come out.
trans: 我在行李提取处被耽搁了，因为我的箱子花了很长时间才出来。

name: We took a red-eye flight,and we slept through the whole trip.
trans: 我们乘坐的是红眼航班，整个旅途都在睡觉。

name: It was quite uncomfortable because we didn't have enough legroom.
trans: 旅途很不舒服，因为我们没有足够的伸腿空间。

name: I was never a punctual person before,but now I've successfully broken myself out of the bad habit of being late all the time.
trans: 我以前从来都不是一个守时的人，但是现在，我已经成功地摆脱了一直迟到 的坏习惯。

name: He's had a long list of impressive accomplishments as a singer in his career.
trans: 在他的演唱生涯中，他取得了一长串了不起的成就。

name: With the help of my neighbour Uncle Zhao,I had a dramatic improvement in maths.
trans: 在我的邻居赵伯伯的帮助下，我的数学有了很大的进步。

name: I've never been successful academically,but I've succeeded elsewhere.
trans: 我在学术/学习上从来没有成功过，但我在别的领域取得了成功。

name: I've been teaching my mom how to use the computer recently.We've seen some progress,but there's still room for improvement.
trans: 最近我一直在教我妈妈如何使用电脑。她已经有了一些进步，但仍有提升的空间。

name: One has to persist and should never give up in order to stand out in any field.
trans: 一个人想在任何领域中脱颖而出都必须坚持、永不放弃。

name: What set those successful people apart from mediocre ones are endurance and the willingness to keep learning.
trans: 令成功者区别于平庸者的，是持久力和不断学习的意愿。

name: I didn't believe I could successfully cook that meal,but I pulled it off at last.
trans: 我之前不相信我能成功做成那顿饭，但我最后还是成功了。

name: My English is still at a pretty basic level,but I'm convinced that all my hard work today will eventually pay off.
trans: 我的英语仍然处于相当基础的水平，但我相信，今天我所有的努力最终会得到回报。

name: The government's efforts to reduce traffic congestion are finally bearing fruit.
trans: 政府减少交通堵塞的努力终于开始取得成效了。

name: Being a pilot was my dream job when I was growing up.I take pride in the fact that this dream has come true.
trans: 当一名飞行员是我儿时的梦想，我为这个梦想已经实现而感到骄傲。

name: I was never a morning person,so I'm really proud that I can successfully roll out of bed at 5:30 every day now.
trans: 我以前从来都不是早起的人，所以我很自豪我现在能每天5点30分就成功地从床上爬起来。

name: The invention of the telephone was a remarkable achievement.
trans: 电话的发明是一项了不起的成就。

name: He worked his way up from humble beginnings to become one of the most famous actors in the country.
trans: 他出身平凡，但却通过努力工作成了全国最著名的演员之一。

name: Personally,I believe being able to do what we enjoy is the ultimate success in life.
trans: 就我个人而言，我认为能够做我们喜欢做的事是人生的终极成功。

name: To my parents,having a stable job and earning a good salary is the only form of success.
trans: 对我的父母来说，拥有一份稳定的工作和挣一份不错的薪水是成功的唯一形式。

name: Seeing her with a guy hand in hand dashed my hopes of going out with her.
trans: 看到她和一个男人手牵手，令我想和她在一起的希望破灭了。

name: I was waiting for a big round of applause after the song,but it turned out that everyone just thought it was so-so.
trans: 这首歌之后，我在等待大家热烈的掌声，但结果是大家都认为我唱得很一般。

name: My dad often tells me that if I keep procrastinating on everything I do,my life is doomed to failure.
trans: 我爸爸经常告诉我，如果我在做每件事时都拖拖拉拉，我的生活注定会失败。

name: I was determined to eat a salad for dinner every day for at least a month,but I failed after only sticking to the plan for three days.
trans: 我决定每天晚上吃沙拉，至少坚持一个月，但我只坚持了三天就失败了。

name: In my view,all celebrities have the responsibility to be good role models for their followers.
trans: 在我看来，所有的名人都有责任为他们的粉丝树立好的榜样。

name: Some people look up to their favourite actors and actresses and therefore copy everything they do.
trans: 有些人崇拜他们喜爱的男女演员，因此会模仿他们所做的一切。

name: Some immature people think that having a glamorous life like their idols do is the biggest success in life.
trans: 一些不成熟的人认为，像他们的偶像一样拥有光鲜亮丽的生活是人生最大的 成功。

name: My mom is my idol.I admire her efforts in raising my four siblings and me as well as taking care of the whole family.
trans: 我妈妈是我的偶像。她非常努力地抚养了我和我的四个兄弟姐妹，并照顾整个家庭。我非常钦佩她。

name: One of my lifelong goals is to travel the world.In order for that goal to be realized,I'll have to work hard to be wealthy first
trans: 我的人生目标之一是周游世界。为了实现这一目标，我必须先努力工作变得富有。

name: I've been itching to go paragliding ever since I saw pictures of my friend doing it.
trans: 自从我看到我朋友的照片后，我就一直渴望去玩滑翔伞。

name: It would be fantastic if I could have a helicopter of my own.That's a pipe dream,I know.
trans: 如果我能拥有一架自己的直升机，那就太好了。我知道这是一个白日梦。

name: It would be great if I could fly.In that case,I wouldn't have to worry about the rush hour traffic anymore.
trans: 如果我能飞就好了。这样的话，我就再也不用担心高峰期的交通了。

name: It would be amazing if l could meet my all-time favourite actress,Jennifer.
trans: 如果我能见到我一直以来最喜欢的女演员詹妮弗，那就太好了。

name: I wish I were a funnier person.I believe I would be more popular among friends.
trans: 我希望自己是一个更幽默的人。那样的话，我相信我在朋友中会更受欢迎。

name: I'm extremely busy on weekdays,so I really treasure the weekend.
trans: 我在工作日非常忙，所以我很珍惜周末的时间。

name: I usually have a lot on my plate on workdays,so by the time the weekend comes,I can feel a sense of relief.
trans: 我通常在工作日有很多事情要做，所以到了周末的时候，我会感到如释重负。

name: Saturdays are usually when I spend some quality time with my folks.We just stay at home and shoot the breeze.
trans: 星期六通常是我和家人一起度过美好时光的时候。我们会待在家里，随便聊聊天。

name: I didn't use to like chatting with my parents when  I was growing  up,but things have changed a lot.I enjoy hanging out with them now.
trans: 小时候，我不喜欢和父母聊天，但是事情发生了很大的变化，现在我喜欢和 他们待在一起。

name: I like to sleep in on weekends.When I finally get out of bed,it'll be time for lunch.
trans: 我喜欢在周末睡懒觉。当我终于起床的时候，就该吃午饭了。

name: I'd worked around the clock for three weeks,and it wasn't until last weekend that I finally had two days off.
trans: 我已经连续工作了三个星期，直到上周末我才休息了两天。

name: I took advantage of the two days and went on a getaway to a seaside city close to my hometown.
trans: 我利用这两天的时间，去了一个离我的家乡很近的海滨城市。

name: All I wanted to do was just get away and totally unwind.
trans: 我就是想去度个假，彻底放松一下。

name: It did help me leave everything behind and forget all my usual responsibilities.
trans: 它确实帮我把一切都抛在脑后，不去想平日的责任。

name: What I usually do on the weekend is hit the stores with my gal pals.We enjoy the time that we spend together at a mall or department store.
trans: 我喜欢在周末和我的女性朋友一起去逛街。我们很喜欢在商场或百货公司里度过的时光。

name: Hitting the gym is what I often do on Saturdays as I don't have much time for it from Monday to Friday.
trans: 我经常在周六去健身房，因为从周一到周五我都没有太多时间去健身。

name: 1Nothing is more relaxing and satisfying than going to the local library and immersing myself in a good book on Sunday afternoon.
trans: 没有什么比在周日的下午去当地的图书馆，沉浸在一本好书中更让人放松和满足的了。

name: I believe I will have my hands full next weekend,so I won't be able to do anything fun.
trans: 我相信下个周末我会很忙，所以我没法做任何有意思的事情。

name: It drove me up the wall when my boss gave me a task when I thought I could rest for a couple of days.
trans: 当我以为自己马上就可以休息几天了的时候，我的老板给了我一项任务，这让我很不爽。

name: I'm known among my friends as a workaholic.I work 24/7 and never take a break.
trans: 我在朋友中是有名的工作狂。我永远都在工作，从不休息。

name: The vast majority of people in my hometown tend to stay at home and catch up on some television shows on weekends.
trans: 我家乡的绝大多数人周末时往往都待在家里，补看一些之前错过的电视节目。

name: I think this is because there are not that many leisure facilities available here.
trans: 我想这是因为这里没有那么多的休闲设施。

name: If there were  more  parks,movie theaters,and shopping centers,I  bet we wouldn't be so cooped up at home.
trans: 如果有更多的公园、电影院和购物中心，我相信我们不会那么宅。

name: Admittedly,more and more people spend their time on social media,so it doesn't make any difference if they're home or outside.
trans: 诚然，越来越多的人把时间花在社交媒体上，所以他们是在家里还是在外面没什么区别。

name: I suppose most employers must be in favour of the idea that employees have to work on the weekend too.
trans: 我想大多数雇主肯定会对员工周末也必须工作的观点表示赞成。

name: What I think is that it's unethical that we work nonstop like machines.
trans: 我认为，让我们像机器一样不停地工作是不道德的。

name: Exploiting employees like this wouldn't be beneficial to the general productivity of a company.
trans: 像这样剥削员工对公司的整体生产力是不利的。

name: Having a couple of days off and recharging their batteries enables people to work more effectively and efficiently when they go back to work.
trans: 有几天的假期进行休整可以让人们在回去工作之后效果更好、效率更高。

name: In my view,weekends are much more important than ever before because we're a lot busier on weekdays than previous generations.
trans: 在我看来，周末比以往任何时候都重要，因为比起上几代人，我们在工作日忙得多。

name: Those  who  are  their  own  bosses  don't  attach  so  much  importance  to weekends because they can decide when to take a rest themselves.
trans: 那些自己当老板的人并不那么重视周末，因为他们可以自己决定什么时候休息。

name: Not so much attention was paid to relaxation before because people had to work extremely hard every day to make a living.
trans: 以前人们不太注意放松，因为人们必须每天努力工作以维持生计。

name: Now that our standard of living has improved greatly,we're beginning to focus on enjoyment in our lives.
trans: 现在我们的生活水平有了很大的提高，我们开始关注生活中的乐趣。

name: This can be seen in the numbers of Chinese tourists in all those major tourist destinations.
trans: 这可以从所有主要旅游目的地的中国游客数量中看出来。

name: Many of those who lived through really hard times are able to enjoy their golden years now.
trans: 许多经历过艰难困苦的人，现在都能很好地享受他们的晚年时光了。

name: Square dancing is a popular way for older people to relax,socialize and have fun in China.
trans: 广场舞是老年人放松、社交、娱乐的一种流行方式。

name: I've just graduated from university,so I don't make much money now.In fact,I'm barely scraping by.
trans: 我刚从大学毕业，所以现在挣的钱不多。事实上，我只是勉强度日。

name: I don't know what came over me!I splurged on an iPhone 12 last week,which is literally the same as my old iPhone X!
trans: 我不知道我怎么了!上周，我花重金买了一台iPhone12,它和我原来的iPhone X完全一样!

name: When I told my parents that I was going travelling for a month after graduation, they totally supported me and said that they would pay for everything!
trans: 当我告诉父母我毕业后要去旅游一个月的时候，他们完全支持我，并说他们会支付一切费用!

name: In order to buy the gift,I scrimped and saved for 3 months.
trans: 为了买这个礼物，我精打细算，攒了3个月的钱。

name: I'm not a millionaire,so every time I hit the stores for something,I have to shop around for a while to find the best deal.
trans: 我不是百万富翁，所以每次我去商店买东西的时候，我都要货比三家一段时 间才能用最划算的价钱买到我想要的东西。

name: The best investment my family has ever made was when we shelled out three million RMB for the apartment we are living in.
trans: 我家所做过的最好的投资，就是花300万人民币买了我们现在住的公寓。

name: Our English teacher's birthday was around the corner,so we all chipped in to buy her a new bike.
trans: 我们英语老师的生日快到了，所以我们一起凑钱给她买了一辆新自行车。

name: One of my worst shopping experiences was when I got ripped off when I was buying a luxury bag.
trans: 有一次我买一个名牌包的时候被宰了，那是我最糟糕的购物经历之一。

name: People who are financially savvy know that they need to have an emergency fund.
trans: 懂得理财的人知道，他们需要一笔应急资金(以备不时之需)。

name: Some people try to grow their finances by putting money in the stock market.I think that's a little risky.
trans: 有些人试图通过把钱投入股市来增加他们的财富。我觉得这有点冒险。

name: I was taught by my parents at a young age to set aside money every week so that I could buy what I wanted later.
trans: 我的父母在我很小的时候就开始教我每周存钱，这样我以后就可以买我想要的东西了。

name: My mom worked two jobs in order to fund my university education.
trans: 为了供我上大学，我妈妈做了两份工。

name: Although that necklace for my girlfriend cost a pretty penny,I was really happy that she said it was the best gift she'd ever received.
trans: 虽然给我女朋友的那条项链花了一大笔钱，但我很高兴，因为她说这是收到过的最好的礼物。

name: My uncle told me that he had paid top dollar for that Transformer and so I had to treasure it.
trans: 我叔叔告诉我他花了很多钱买那个变形金刚，所以我必须珍惜它。

name: My dream job?Well,everybody says I'm a terrific singer,so I guess I'll just try to cash in on that.
trans: 我理想中的工作?每个人都说我是一个很棒的歌手，所以我觉得我需要好好利用我这个能力。

name: One way to save money is to buy second-hand items from thrift shops.
trans: 省钱的一个方法就是从旧货店买二手物品。

name: Whenever there's a promotion at the nearest supermarket,my mom goes there and stocks up.
trans: 每当离我们家最近的那个超市有促销活动，我妈妈就会去那里囤货。

name: I used to run a small bookstore,but it went under.
trans: 我曾经经营一家小书店，但它倒闭了。

name: Although online shopping is becoming increasingly popular these days,I don't suppose brick-and-mortar stores will completely disappear.
trans: 虽然现在网上购物越来越流行，但我不认为实体店会完全消失。

name: When shopping for clothes,everyone wants to try them on before deciding whether to buy them or not.
trans: 买衣服的时候，每个人都想试穿一下，然后再决定是否要买。

name: I'm lucky to have a mom who's obsessive with cleanliness.She's always doing housework,which means I don't have to do anything.
trans: 我很幸运，有个有洁癖的妈妈。她总是在做家务，这意味着我什么都不用做。

name: My  parents  and  I  do  some  chores  together  every  weekend.It's  an opportunity for us to bond.
trans: 我和父母每周末都一起做家务。这是我们增进感情的机会。

name: I remember earning one yuan every time I helped sweep the floor when I Was a kid.
trans: 我记得小的时候，我每一次帮忙扫地，都能挣一元钱。

name: It's weird that doing the dishes has grown on me.It feels pretty good when l dip my hands in soapy water and clean all those bowls and plates.
trans: 很奇怪，我开始喜欢上洗碗了。当我把手浸在肥皂水里洗干净所有的碗和盘子时，感觉特别好。

name: I don't like it when I'm asked to do the laundry.It's too much effort.
trans: 我不喜欢别人叫我洗衣服。这太费力了。

name: It's not uncommon for children in China to have never done any housework.
trans: 在中国，孩子们从来没有做过家务的情况很常见。

name: They're either too spoilt or too busy with schoolwork.
trans: 他们要么是被宠坏了，要么是忙于学习。

name: I believe helping around the house allows children to develop a sense of responsibility and independence,which will be crucial to them when they grow up.
trans: 我相信帮忙做家务可以培养孩子的责任感和独立意识，这在他们长大后他们至关重要。

name: Housework can be more interesting if  we do it  with loved ones.It's some quality time that we spend together.
trans: 如果我们和所爱的人一起做家务，会更有意思。这是我们一起度过的美好时光。

name: It's likely that robots will be in every household taking over all the chores that we do today.
trans: 机器人可能会在每个家庭中接管我们今天做的所有家务。
